Ring_of_Fire.help: Immobilizes your target in a Ring of Fire, dealing Fire damage over time. More resilient foes may require multiple Fire Rings to Immobilize. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Ring_of_Fire.targetHelp: The Ring of Fire is burning you and preventing you from moving.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.

Soot.help: Incapacitates a distant foe by Charring them with smoldering soot and cinders. The target is left helpless, choking on the soot. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Soot.targetHelp: The Soot is causing damage to you and preventing you from acting.

Fire_Cages.help: Immobilizes a group of foes in Fire Cages, dealing Fire damage over time. More resilient foes may require multiple Fire Cages to Immobilize. Fire Cages is slower and less damaging than Ring of Fire, but can capture multiple targets. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Fire_Cages.shortHelp: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Minor DoT(Fire), Foe Immobilize
Fire_Cages.targetHelp: The Fire Cage is burning you and preventing you from moving.

Smoke.help: Covers all foes near your target in clouds of Smoke. The villains are so blinded that they can hardly see a thing. Most villains will not be able to see past normal melee range, although some may have better perception. If the villains are attacked, they will be alerted to your presence, but will suffer a penalty to their chance to hit. Recharge: Slow
Smoke.targetHelp: The Smoke is reducing your visual range and chance to hit.
Smoke.attackerHit: You fill the area with {PowerName}, lowering the chance to hit and perception of {PlayerDest}!
Smoke.victimHit: You have been blinded by the Smoke from {PlayerSource}. Your chance to hit and perception have been reduced.

Hot_Feet.help: While active, you heat the earth in a large area around yourself. Enemy movement is Slowed as they attempt to flee the immediate area. All foes in the affected area may also suffer some damage over time. You cannot fly and must be near the ground to use this power. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Hot_Feet.targetHelp: The ground is extremely hot and burning you. Your running speed is reduced.

Flashfire.help: You can bring forth a Flashfire to Disorient a group of foes and deal some damage over time. Target must be on the ground to activate Flashfire. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Flashfire.shortHelp: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Minor DMG(Fire), Foe Disorient

Cinders.help: Incapacitates foes around the caster by whirling Cinders around them. The targets are left helpless, choking on the soot. Recharge: Very Long

Bonfire.help: You can create a Bonfire that knocks back and burns any foes who try to pass through it. Recharge: Long
Bonfire.shortHelp: Ranged (Location AoE), Minor DMG(Fire), Foe Knockback

messages.attackerHit: You create a massive {PowerName}!

Fire_Imps.help: You can craft 3 small Fire Imps out of pure flame in a targeted location. Fire Imps will viciously attack any nearby foes, but they only possess the most basic instincts. Fire Imps can be healed and buffed like any teammate. Type ''/release_pets'' in the chat window to release all your pets. Recharge: Very Long

messages.attackerHit: You call forth Three {PowerName} of dancing flame!
